resources.string: Currently the only device to run Android TV is the Nexus Player
Simple TV-style remote; with voice search hardware
Android app that interfaces Android TV over wifi
Android TV is simple and magical. Itâ€™s all about finding and enjoying content and apps with the least amount of friction.
Google TV is not the same thing as Android TV. Google TV devices ran a customized version of Android (almost exclusively based on 3.2) Apps for Google TV are not available on Android TV
Android TV is running Android 5.0 Lollipop
Android Studio ships with an \'TV Activity\'. This adds a lot of boiler plate that is mostly useless to non-beginner developers.
